sentences.sentence: This use of dialogue underscores not only the dizzy quality of the character played by Katherine Hepburn, but also the absurdity of the film itself and thus its humor.
sentences.translation: 这种对白的使用不仅突出了凯瑟琳·赫本所扮演角色的大大咧咧的特性，也突出了电影本身的荒谬和幽默。

sentences.sentence: It was only later that she could see the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.translation: 直到后来她才看出了那种局面的荒唐。

sentences.sentence: His works on the absurdity and sufferings of life create the most comprehensive irony.
sentences.translation: 他的作品对生活中的荒谬和苦难进行了最全面的反讽。
